p.s: In the following report I will tell you something about the experience from my friend Bianca.
She worked as a volunteer in India with children and she told me a lot about her time there.
She had every day the same things to do.
After the breakfast she had to learn some English with the boys and after the break she had to learn some English with the girls.
She told me that the best thing of the volunteer program were the children.
From the first secundesecond, they were full of so much love and acceptance.
They wanted to know everything about her life and they had so much love for livelife.
She said that you can't compare that with the children in Germany.
Nevertheless that they oftoften a not that nice livelife before, the children in India were so happy and therforetherefore my friend was also happy.
They had every day so much fun there and they gave my friend so much love, patience, hope and espaciallyespecially gratitude.
So I think the volunteer program was a really beautiful experience for my friend.
